title: Pasian Kumpigam
lyrics:
Pasian Kumpigam zaw nek leh dawn hilou
Silh leh ten leh neih leh lam hilou
Hauhna thu hilou, zawnna thu hilou
Khasiangthou a diktatna hi zaw

Aw Na Kumpigam ka lak uah hong tung hen
Michih ah Na Kumpigam tung hen
Innkuan khempeuh ah, gamsung khempeuh ah
Aw Na gam ka lak uah hong tung hen

Pasian in a hon sam, aw ei gingtute
Lemna leh lainatna nei ding in
Tua pen i Pasian, lungtaina ahi
Leimi diâ€™n a lungdamhuai hi veh

Aw Na Kumpigam ka lak uah hong tung hen
Michih ah Na Kumpigam tung hen
Innkuan khempeuh ah, gamsung khempeuh ah
Aw Na gam ka lak uah hong tung hen

A simthu i thei in, A zaila thei hang
A khekhap zui ding i tawm ngei e
Sianthouna nei in, diktatna nei in
Amah bang i khangtou ding uhi

Aw Na Kumpigam ka lak uah hong tung hen
Michih ah Na Kumpigam tung hen
Innkuan khempeuh ah, gamsung khempeuh ah
Aw Na gam ka lak uah hong tung hen

title: Nang toh houlim nuam bek hing
lyrics:
Toupa nang tung ah nna khat zong hong ngen kei ning
Nang toh a houlim nuam bek hing
Lungdamna kong kouh zoh louh zah dong
N'ong piaksa khempeuh te kiching
Nang toh a houlim nuam bek hing

Lungkhamna dahna zingchiang in tuak kha mah ning
Ka khitui tampi luang kha ding
Tua haksatna ka tuah ma in ah
Kon nget nop tuan omkei Toupa aw
Nang toh a houlim nuam bek hing

Haksatna te in thu hon ngen sak pahpah a
Tun bel a houlim nuam bek hing
Kiphatsakna them zong neilou in
Lungdam' hong kouh nuam ing Toupa aw
Nang toh a houlim nuam bek hing

Lungkhamna dahna zingchiang in tuak kha mah ning
Ka khitui tampi luang kha ding
Tua haksatna ka tuah ma in ah
Kon nget nop tuan omkei Toupa aw
Nang toh a houlim nuam bek hing

title: Jesu a hoihpen Toupa
lyrics:
Jesu a hoihpen Toupa
Jesu lamdang thulakpa
Min khempeuh sang in minlian zaw k'ong pia uh hi
Kou toh hong om khawm lamdang hi

Jesu a hoihpen Toupa
Jesu lamdang thulakpa
Min khempeuh sang in minlian zaw k'ong pia uh hi
Kou toh hong om khawm lamdang hi

Phat ding na kilawm hi
Pahtawi ding in
Khut siangthou te laam tou sa in
Na min siangthou hong phat ung

Phat ding na kilawm hi
Pahtawi ding in
Khut siangthou te laam tou sa in
Na min siangthou hong phat ung

Nang na lian hi,
Na bawl nate lamdang hi
Nang bang omlou hi Toupa...
Nang bang omlou hi Toupa

Nang na lian hi,
Na bawl nate lamdang hi
Nang bang omlou hi Toupa...
Nang bang omlou hi Toupa

title: Phat lou thei ka hi kei
lyrics:
Toupa mah ka phat chiang
Nuam ka sa semsem
Phat ding in kilawm pen e
Zaila in ka phat nuam
Sasa leng ka nuam
Zaila in ka awi chimlou

Phat lou thei ka hi kei
Lam lou thei ka hi kei 
Toupa mah ka phat chiang nuam
Lamlam in ka phat ding 
Tumging toh ka phat ding 
Tawp lou in ka phat ding
Phatlou thei ka hi kei hi

Kumpite a ding in Kumpipa ahi
Toupate' a din Toupa
Kumpipa ahih na'n tawpni a nei lou
Bei lou in a lian tawntung

Phat lou thei ka hi kei 
Lam lou thei ka hi kei 
Toupa mah ka phat chiang nuam
Lamlam in ka phat ding 
Tumging toh ka phat ding 
Tawp lou in ka phat ding
Phatlou thei ka hi kei hi

Ei ding a a hoihna
Sut seng ding hi lou
Zingsang in a hong thak zel
A itna  thupi dan
Tangtawn in a om
Phat ding ka thupi pen hi

Phat lou thei ka hi kei 
Lam lou thei ka hi kei 
Toupa mah ka phat chiang nuam
Lamlam in ka phat ding 
Tumging toh ka phat ding 
Tawp lou in ka phat ding
Phatlou thei ka hi kei hi.

title: Damlai hinkhua
lyrics:
Dam lai hinkhua suk leh tou ka pal hun chiang in
Nuam leh kipak a om det ding lunggulh man
Khemna haksa pel din Pa kana nget zel hang'
Ka Toupa aw nang thu hi hen chithei kei veng aw!

Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi

Ka ma ah khemna om chi'n lau zel veng Toupa
Maituah ngamlou lam tuam tai siat nang zong ing  
Toupa gal hat thil hihtheihna phok banlou in
Dawilok hinatel ing e Pa hon ngaidam in aw

Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi

Khelh vang thuak na hi zong Pa hehpihna'n hon pi
Niteng Khros pua tuanglam sau ah bah zong leng
Toupan a itna aw nem toh hon huau zel a
Ka hatlouhna Amin laamsangtu hon suak sak ta

Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi

Unau setan khemna nisim na dou zel maw?
Douna hat zong vualzou gingtu hi ding in
Sian simthu pha ma suan nisim melma dou le
Zohna puanlap tawi sang zaila thak i lem ngei ding

title: Nun aam ni
lyrics:
Simlei tomkal hinsung in 
hou lung kumkhawm in
lungtuak leng diamdiam leng
Ei a din manpha...
Simlei in tangtawn daihlou 
Sianmang liim beel ni

Simlei khuam bang luah den din 
mimbang i piang lou
lungtuak leng diamdiam ni
damlai hun leh ni
Tuibang kiam mualliam zel
lenlai i nun nuam
Sian Siam a tangbang i damlai ni
Aw aw.. aam ni nun aam ni
Aw aw.. aam ni nun aam ni.
 
Simlei laigil sung ah kua a lianpen diam..?
Lenna i vangkhua ah kua a lunpen diam?
simlei in tangtawn daih lou 
Sianmang liim bel ni

Simlei khuam bang luah den din 
mimbang i piang lou
lungtuak leng diamdiam ni
damlai hun leh ni
Tuibang kiam mualliam zel
lenlai i nun nuam
Sian Siam a tangbang i damlai ni
Aw aw.. aam ni nun aam ni
Aw aw.. aam ni nun aam ni.
 
Kei lun ing/hun chiken maw tomkal i hin sung in 
Kei ka mang chiken maw phamnan ei hon ngak
simlei in tangtawn daih lou 
Sianmang liim beel ni.

mimbang i piang lou
lungtuak leng diamdiam ni
damlai hun leh ni

lenlai i nun nuam

title: Lei ah muan ding omlou.
